Headline: Magnum archives: The spontaneous art of street photography
Article_Body: A 1965 image from a Welsh mining town, by US photographer Bruce Davidson. Scroll through to see more images from the new Magnum Photos book, "Magnum Streetwise." A street crossing in Yerevan, Armenia (2014). An image from Disneyland in Tokyo, as featured in British photographer Martin Parr's book, "Common Sense." A 1955 shot taken in Colorado, USA, by Magnum photographer Elliott Erwitt. A 2005 image taken by Norwegian photojournalist Jonas Bendiksen in the Black Sea region of Abkhazia. A scene from Piazza della Rotonda in Rome, Italy, by Richard Kalvar (1980). A shot taken by Herbert List from the window of his Rome apartment, where he was confined with a foot injury at the time. Olivia Arthur's shot of a worker unloading sharks at a fish market in Dubai, UAE (2013). "Magnum Streetwise," published by Thames & Hudson, is available now.
